definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Natural biopolymer assembly mechanism and functionalization.
sentences.chinese: 天然生物高分子聚集机制与功能。

sentences.english: Shear flow is one of the significant parts of the rheology of polymer blends.
sentences.chinese: 剪切流动是高分子共混物流变学的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: Ring-opening metathesis polymerization(ROMP) is one of the most important part in the field of polymer synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 开环易位聚合反应是高分子合成领域引人注目的目标。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a new method of forming macromolecule self-assembled monolayers.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立一种形成高分子自组装膜的新方法。

sentences.english: The advances of side-chain polymeric liquid crystals as GLC stationary phases are described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了侧链高分子液晶作为气相色谱固定液的进展。

sentences.english: There is an optimum value about the concentration of a high molecular weight polymer.
sentences.chinese: 高分子质量浓度存在一个最佳值。

sentences.english: Polymeric aluminum chloride (PAC) is an inorganic macromolecular compound which is good at cleaning water.
sentences.chinese: 聚合氯化铝又称PAC，是一种无机高分子化合物。

sentences.english: For the laminar flow of Non-newtonian fluids some drag reduction, like turbulent flow, has been found.
sentences.chinese: 为探讨高分子稀溶液管内流动减阻提供了理论依据。

sentences.english: Polysilane is a material of polymer whose backbone is made up of silicon.
sentences.chinese: 聚硅烷是一种主链由硅原子组成的高分子材料。

sentences.english: The spacer ring is a precision detail made of non-magnetic alloy or polymer.
sentences.chinese: 该间隔环是精确详细的非磁性合金或高分子的。

sentences.english: Thiophene polymers is one of the most intensively investigated functional polymers.
sentences.chinese: 噻吩类聚合物是研究较为广泛的功能高分子材料。

sentences.english: The basic structure and manufacturing process of the capacitive polymer humidity sensor are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了电容式高分子湿敏元件的基本结构及制造工艺。

sentences.english: This is the webpage of Biopolymers .
sentences.chinese: 这是《生物高分子》杂志的网页。

sentences.english: Cooling paste based on polyacrylate hydrogel was fabricated via radical polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 制备了以聚丙烯酸钠为基材的高分子水凝胶退热贴。

sentences.english: The develop progress of inorganic polymeric coagulant in recent years were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了近年来无机高分子混凝剂的研制进展。

sentences.english: Preparation methods and applications of functionalized polymer microspheres were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了功能化高分子微球的合成方法和应用领域。
